unnormalised: Hey, Delhiites, are you segregating your waste? Seems like the South Delhi Municipal Corporation (SDMC) is cracking down! Reports coming in say hefty fines are being levied on households mixing wet and dry waste. Remember the "Lagaan" days? No more dodging your duties!
normalised: Hey, Delhiites, are you segregating your waste? Seems like the South Delhi Municipal Corporation (S D M C) is cracking down! Reports coming in say hefty fines are being levied on households mixing wet and dry waste. Remember the "Lagaan" days? No more dodging your duties!

unnormalised: Speaking of waste, IIT Madras just announced a breakthrough in converting plastic waste into usable fuel. Amazing, right? They’re piloting the project in Chennai and hoping to scale it across India.
normalised: Speaking of waste, I I T Madras just announced a breakthrough in converting plastic waste into usable fuel. Amazing, right? They’re piloting the project in Chennai and hoping to scale it across India.

unnormalised: And guess what? A cleanliness drive is planned in Vrindavan next month. Apparently, the Yamuna riverbanks are choked with plastic. Let's hope this initiative, coordinated by the Nagar Nigam, makes a real difference.
normalised: And guess what? A cleanliness drive is planned in Vrindavan next month. Apparently, the Yamuna riverbanks are choked with plastic. Let's hope this initiative, coordinated by the Nagar Nigam, makes a real difference.

unnormalised: The goal is a cleaner Bharat, folks! Remember what Gandhiji said about cleanliness being next to godliness? Let's do our bit. Every little action, from composting kitchen waste to reducing single-use plastics, counts. Rs. 500 fine might pinch, but a cleaner India is priceless, hai na? It's time to act, yaar! 1000 km of clean rivers is the dream!
normalised: The goal is a cleaner Bharat, folks! Remember what Gandhiji said about cleanliness being next to godliness? Let's do our bit. Every little action, from composting kitchen waste to reducing single-use plastics, counts. Rupee five hundred fine might pinch, but a cleaner India is priceless, hai na? It's time to act, yaar! one thousand kilometer of clean rivers is the dream!
